name: sv-express
description: SV Express - International parcel delivery management system

scripts.dev: echo 'Run dev in individual packages: npm run dev -w packages/api'
scripts.build: npm run build -w packages/shared && npm run build -w packages/api && npm run build -w packages/admin && npm run build -w packages/portal
scripts.clean: npm run clean -w packages/shared && npm run clean -w packages/api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check -w packages/api && npm run type-check -w packages/admin && npm run type-check -w packages/portal

author: SV Express
